abstract: BP may have found a savior in the deep pockets of its Russian partners, who no doubt feel like they’re at a fire sale. Whether they can raise the money for the $20 billion escrow account and $2.6 billion in clean-up fees remains to be seen.
snippet: BP may have found a savior in the deep pockets of its Russian partners, who no doubt feel like they’re at a fire sale. Whether they can raise the money for the $20 billion escrow account and $2.6 billion in clean-up fees remains to be seen.
lead_paragraph: BP may have found a savior in the deep pockets of its Russian partners, who no doubt feel like they’re at a fire sale, no pun intended. Whether they can raise the money for the $20 billion escrow account and $2.6 billion in clean-up fees remains to be seen.
